results.title: Far from Heaven
results.creator_credit: Todd Haynes, Christine Vachon, Jody Patton, Vulcan Productions and Focus Features
results.brief_description: Mrs Cathy Whitaker (Julianne Moore) is the equivalent of the 1950s super mom - running the household for her busy executive husband and two young children with the help of her African American maid Sybil. She has a busy social circle, doing good deeds for the community, all whilst being impeccably dressed and coiffured. But this nuclear family is not what it seems as the husband (Dennis Quaid) has a secret passion that cannot be quelled. A friendship with the gardener (Dennis Haysbert), an African American single father, develops into something deeper for Cathy but society deems their acquaintance as simply unacceptable. A film about relationships and society where people’s desires and needs are often at odds with a repressed moral code/sense of ethics, especially in 1950s America. Written and directed by Todd Haynes, with music by Elmer Bernstein. Highly stylised art direction and costume design appropriate to the period. Cast includes Viola Davis, Patricia Clarkson, Celia Weston.

results.title: Far from alone
results.creator_credit: Jean Yarbrough, Board of Temperance of the Methodist Church and Jam Handy

results.title: Far Eastern Cookery
results.brief_description: Far Eastern Cookery is a celebration of the myriad and distinctive flavours of the Far East. This video presents 16 of Madhur Jaffrey’s favourite dishes from Thailand, Japan, Korea, Hong Kong, the Philippines, Malaysia, Vietnam and Indonesia. Madhur Jaffrey evokes the atmosphere of each exotic country as she invites us to travel with her through the fruit markets of Bangkok to the seafront of Western Sumatra.

results.title: Far East
results.brief_description: A political thriller which exposes the violent and exploitative realities of multi-national companies in SE Asia. Against this background, three Australians drift between stability and desperation. This is a tough story of human emotions stretched to the limit by war, love and mystery. Cast includes Helen Morse and Bryan Brown.

results.title: Far away castle: music video by Sunwrae
results.creator_credit: Multimedia Design, Faculty of Design, Swinburne University of Technology and Colin Chee
results.brief_description:
A beautiful aesthetic piece of instrumental contemporary classical music, in rondo form (repetition of a single theme) with various tempi and expressions (music cycle). Colin Chee uses animation to portray music as both a life force and an escape from reality. Ethereal in style, movement and sound.
Music composed by Rae Howell or Sunwrae.

results.title: Far and away
results.creator_credit: Ron Howard, Brian Grazer and Universal Studios
results.brief_description: The setting is the West Coast of Ireland, 1892. Joseph Donnelly (Tom Cruise), a poor tenant farmer, is determined to bring justice to the oppressive landlord responsible for killing his father. After setting fire to the landlord’s house, Donnelly runs into the landlord’s daughter Shannon (Nicole Kidman), and together they head for America - the two united by their desire to own their own land. Initially things seem to indicate a positive future for Joseph and Shannon who are posing as brother and sister. They secure lodgings, and Joseph is able to bring in a small income by boxing. The security doesn’t last however, and the two must separate, just as they discover their true feelings for one another. Joseph begins work on a railroad, his goal to possess his own land in the new territory never far from his thoughts. Once again, Shannon re enters his world, only this time she has a fiance, but still shares Joseph’s dream to own her own land.

results.title: Fantasy of feet
results.creator_credit: Frederic Goodich, Warren Brown and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
results.brief_description: Shows scenes of feet walking, dancing, running, and jumping, barefooted and in sandals, flippers, slippers and boots to encourage children to think about the different kinds of shoes and how feet serve their many functions. Suitable for upper primary level.

results.title: Fantasy man
results.creator_credit: John Meagher, Darrell Lass, Basil Appleby and Centaur Enterprises
results.brief_description: Mid-life crisis, bored with work, his wife and his life, Nick Bailey (Harold Hopkins) begins to fantasize about the young and rather attractive Donna (Kerry Mack), who works at the hamburger stand near his office. Nick’s wife Liz (Jeanie Drynan) confused and disturbed by Nick’s strange and secretive behaviour, especially his long showers, finds herself fantasizing about a former lover after a chance meeting. Can their marriage survive? Does anyone care? A low-budget film with a pretty ordinary plot. Cast also features Kate Fitzpatrick.

results.title: Fantastic Mr. Fox
results.brief_description: The Fantastic Mr. Fox bored with his current life, plans a heist against the three local farmers. The farmers, tired of sharing their chickens with the sly fox, seek revenge against him and his family.

constellations_other.name: Storyboards to Academy Awards
constellations_other.description: Storyboards allow filmmakers, showrunners and game designers to visualise and communicate how their stories will look on-screen.
